00019         CBundleRepository::CBundleRepository()
00020                 : m_lastBundleId(0)
00021                 , m_systemBundle(0)
00022         { }
00023 
00024         void CBundleRepository::Init(CSystemBundle* systemBundle)
00025         {
00026                 THREAD_LAUNCHER();
00027 
00028                 m_systemBundle = systemBundle;
00029 
00030                 write_lock l(m_lock);
00031                 m_bundlesById.insert(std::make_pair(0, systemBundle));
00032                 m_bundlesByLocation.insert(std::make_pair(systemBundle->getLocation(), systemBundle));
00033         }
00034 
00036 
00037         CBundleRepository::~CBundleRepository()
00038         {
00039                 THREAD_LAUNCHER();
00040                 write_lock l(m_lock);
00041 
00042                 for(TBundleById::const_iterator it = m_bundlesById.begin(), end = m_bundlesById.end();
00043                         it != end; ++it)
00044                 {
00045                         if(it->first != 0)
00046                         {
00047                                 it->second->Finalize();
00048                                 it->second->Release();
00049                         }
00050                 }
00051         }
00052 
00054 
00055         com_ptr<IBundle> CBundleRepository::CreateNewBundle(const char* location)
00056         {
00057                 THREAD_ANY();
00058 
00059                 CBundle* bundle;
00060                 create_instance_impl(&bundle);
00061 
00062                 bundle->FinalConstruct(++m_lastBundleId, location, m_systemBundle);
00063 
00064                 {
00065                         write_lock l(m_lock);
00066                         m_bundlesById.insert(std::make_pair(m_lastBundleId, bundle));
00067                         m_bundlesByLocation.insert(std::make_pair(location, bundle));
00068                         return bundle;
00069                 }
00070         }
00071 
00073 
00074         com_ptr<IBundle> CBundleRepository::getBundle(size_t bundleId) const
00075         {
00076                 THREAD_ANY();
00077 
00078                 read_lock l(m_lock);
00079                 TBundleById::const_iterator it = m_bundlesById.find(bundleId);
00080                 return it != m_bundlesById.end() ? it->second : 0;
00081         }
00082 
00084 
00085         com_ptr<IBundle> CBundleRepository::getBundle(const char* location) const
00086         {
00087                 THREAD_ANY();
00088 
00089                 read_lock l(m_lock);
00090                 TBundleByLocation::const_iterator it = m_bundlesByLocation.find(location);
00091                 return it != m_bundlesByLocation.end() ? it->second : 0;
00092         }
00093 
00095 
00096         void CBundleRepository::getBundles(IDynArray<com_ptr<IBundle> >& bundles) const
00097         {
00098                 THREAD_ANY();
00099                 read_lock l(m_lock);
00100 
00101                 for(TBundleById::const_iterator it = m_bundlesById.begin(), end = m_bundlesById.end();
00102                         it != end; ++it)
00103                 {
00104                         bundles.push_back(it->second);
00105                 }
00106         }
00107 
00109 
00110         void CBundleRepository::RemoveBundle(IBundle* bundle)
00111         {
00112                 THREAD_ANY();
00113                 write_lock l(m_lock);
00114 
00115                 m_bundlesById.erase(bundle->getBundleId());
00116                 m_bundlesByLocation.erase(bundle->getLocation());
00117 
00118                 static_cast<CBundle*>(bundle)->Finalize();
00119                 bundle->Release();
00120         }

00126                 THREAD_ANY();
00127 
00128                 return m_listeners;
00129         }

00134         {
00135                 THREAD_ANY();

00142         void CBundleRepository::AddListener(IBundleListener *listener)
00143         {
00144                 THREAD_FRAMEWORK();
00145 
00146                 if(implements_interface(listener, uuid_of(ISynchronousBundleListener)))
00147                         m_syncListeners.AddListener(listener);
00148                 else
00149                         m_listeners.AddListener(listener);
00150         }
00151 
00153 
00154         void CBundleRepository::RemoveListener(IBundleListener* listener)
00155         {
00156                 THREAD_FRAMEWORK();
00157 
00158                 if(implements_interface(listener, uuid_of(ISynchronousBundleListener)))
00159                         m_syncListeners.RemoveListener(listener);
00160                 else
00161                         m_listeners.RemoveListener(listener);
00162         }
